CodeChunks.CodeChunk: Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "From Patch 4.1 onwards, this profile will assume you can Fly.\n Please ensure you are attuned to the Stormblood zones.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(5000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(6000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "From this point, this profile assumes you can Fly.\n If you can not. Please attune to the Stormblood zones before continuing.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(26000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Please complete the next Quest Objective manually.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(26000);
